criteria: Accuracy of Describing HIV Transmission Methods
Accuracy of Describing HIV Non-Transmission Methods
descriptions: The student demonstrates no understanding of HIV transmission or provides incorrect information.
The student identifies only one accurate method of HIV transmission and/or includes significant inaccuracies.
The student identifies some accurate methods of HIV transmission but includes inaccuracies or omits important information.
The student accurately describes several methods of HIV transmission, but there may be minor omissions or lack of detail.
The student thoroughly and accurately describes most methods of HIV transmission, demonstrating a solid understanding.
The student comprehensively and accurately describes various methods of HIV transmission, demonstrating a thorough and nuanced understanding.
The student demonstrates no understanding of how HIV is not transmitted or provides incorrect information.
The student identifies only one accurate method of HIV non-transmission and/or includes significant inaccuracies.
The student identifies some accurate methods of HIV non-transmission but includes inaccuracies or omits important information.
The student accurately describes several methods of HIV non-transmission, but there may be minor omissions or lack of detail.
The student thoroughly and accurately describes most methods of HIV non-transmission, demonstrating a solid understanding.
The student comprehensively and accurately describes various methods of HIV non-transmission, demonstrating a thorough and nuanced understanding.
The student's description is unclear, confusing, and uses imprecise language.
The student's description is somewhat unclear and uses imprecise language in several instances.
The student's description is generally clear but contains some instances of imprecise language or jargon.
The student's description is clear and uses precise language most of the time.
The student's description is clear, concise, and uses precise language throughout.
The student's description is exceptionally clear, concise, and uses precise, sophisticated language to convey complex information effectively.
